com.alee.managers.popup
Class PopupManager

java.lang.Object
  com.alee.managers.popup.PopupManager

public class PopupManager
extends java.lang.Object

User: mgarin Date: 13.07.11 Time: 17:19

This manager allows you to add your own popups within the frame bounds (within the window root pane bounds to be exact). These popups could be either modal or not and could be also bound to component. Also there are few specific popup types that are created for buttons and other Swing components and act differently than standart popups.
